alert.note: Alert for Powder River; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:56PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Big Horn and southwestern Powder River Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 31 miles northwest of Spotted Horse, or 43 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Otter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
